languages.text: {n}Обожженные губы кривятся в горькой усмешке.{/n} "Как бы это ни было забавно, но... да, Ваша Светлость. Друкари не подозревали, что обычный секретарь Адептус Администратум понимает их чужеродную речь. В процессе истязаний я понял, что ксеносам все это время помогали люди. Ренегаты, или пираты, или... кто-то вроде. Понадобится время, чтобы вычислить этих предателей Человечества, но, даю слово, они поплатятся за то, что произошло на Даргонусе!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Обожженные губы кривятся в горькой усмешке.{/n} "Как бы это ни было забавно, но... да, Ваша Светлость. Друкари не подозревали, что обычный секретарь Адептус Администратум понимает их чужеродную речь. В процессе истязаний я понял, что ксеносам все это время помогали люди. Ренегаты, или пираты, или... кто-то вроде. Понадобится время, чтобы вычислить этих предателей Человечества, но, даю слово, они поплатятся за то, что произошло на Даргонусе!"

languages.text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Funnily enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. Over the course of my torture, I came to understand that the xenos had been receiving help from humans all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

languages.text: {n}彼は焼けた唇でわずかに苦笑した。{/n}「面白いことに…色々わかりました、陛下。デュカーリは帝国行政局の長官風情が異種族の言葉を理解できるとは夢にも思わなかったのでしょう。拷問されている最中に、異種族はずっと人間から支援を受けていたのだと理解したのです。背教者か、海賊か…そういった類の者だと思います。人類の裏切り者を特定するまで時間を要しますが、必ずやダルゴナスでしでかした罪の代償を払ってもらうと誓います！」
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Funnily enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. Over the course of my torture, I came to understand that the xenos had been receiving help from humans all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は焼けた唇でわずかに苦笑した。{/n}「面白いことに…色々わかりました、陛下。デュカーリは帝国行政局の長官風情が異種族の言葉を理解できるとは夢にも思わなかったのでしょう。拷問されている最中に、異種族はずっと人間から支援を受けていたのだと理解したのです。背教者か、海賊か…そういった類の者だと思います。人類の裏切り者を特定するまで時間を要しますが、必ずやダルゴナスでしでかした罪の代償を払ってもらうと誓います！」

languages.text: {n}他灼伤的嘴唇露出一丝苦笑。{/n}“老实说……我确实了解到了一些很有趣的情况，大人。那些黑暗灵族或许没有想到，区区一介帝国内政部秘书，竟然能听懂异形的语言。当他们折磨我的时候，我听到他们说，原来一直都有人类在协助那些异形，叛乱分子、海盗……诸如此类的人。想揪出人类的叛徒或许要花上些时间，但我向您保证，他们一定会为达戈努斯发生的一切付出代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Funnily enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. Over the course of my torture, I came to understand that the xenos had been receiving help from humans all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他灼伤的嘴唇露出一丝苦笑。{/n}“老实说……我确实了解到了一些很有趣的情况，大人。那些黑暗灵族或许没有想到，区区一介帝国内政部秘书，竟然能听懂异形的语言。当他们折磨我的时候，我听到他们说，原来一直都有人类在协助那些异形，叛乱分子、海盗……诸如此类的人。想揪出人类的叛徒或许要花上些时间，但我向您保证，他们一定会为达戈努斯发生的一切付出代价。”

languages.text: {n}Sus labios quemados esbozan una amarga sonrisa.{/n} «La verdad... es que sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los Drukhari no tenían ni idea de que un simple secretario del Adeptus Administratum podría entender su lengua alienígena. Durante el curso de mi tortura, he podido descubrir que los xenos habían recibido ayuda de humanos todo este tiempo. De renegados, de piratas... o de algo parecido. Tardaré en identificar a estos traidores a la Humanidad, ¡pero le doy mi palabra de que pagarán por lo sucedido en Dargonus!».
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Funnily enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. Over the course of my torture, I came to understand that the xenos had been receiving help from humans all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus labios quemados esbozan una amarga sonrisa.{/n} «La verdad... es que sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Los Drukhari no tenían ni idea de que un simple secretario del Adeptus Administratum podría entender su lengua alienígena. Durante el curso de mi tortura, he podido descubrir que los xenos habían recibido ayuda de humanos todo este tiempo. De renegados, de piratas... o de algo parecido. Tardaré en identificar a estos traidores a la Humanidad, ¡pero le doy mi palabra de que pagarán por lo sucedido en Dargonus!».

languages.text: {n}Ses lèvres brûlées se tordent en un sourire amer.{/n} « Étonnamment... oui, Votre Seigneurie. Les Drukharis n'ont pas imaginé une seule seconde qu'un vulgaire secrétaire de l'Adeptus Administratum pouvait comprendre leur langue. Tandis qu'ils me torturaient, j'ai compris que des humains aidaient ces xénos depuis le début. Des renégats, des pirates, ou... quelque chose d'approchant. Il nous faudra du temps pour identifier ces traîtres à l'humanité, mais je vous promets qu'ils paieront pour ce qu'ils ont fait à Dargonus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Funnily enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. Over the course of my torture, I came to understand that the xenos had been receiving help from humans all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses lèvres brûlées se tordent en un sourire amer.{/n} « Étonnamment... oui, Votre Seigneurie. Les Drukharis n'ont pas imaginé une seule seconde qu'un vulgaire secrétaire de l'Adeptus Administratum pouvait comprendre leur langue. Tandis qu'ils me torturaient, j'ai compris que des humains aidaient ces xénos depuis le début. Des renégats, des pirates, ou... quelque chose d'approchant. Il nous faudra du temps pour identifier ces traîtres à l'humanité, mais je vous promets qu'ils paieront pour ce qu'ils ont fait à Dargonus ! »

languages.text: {n}Seine verbrannten Lippen verziehen sich zu einem verbitterten Lächeln.{/n} "Erstaunlicherweise ... konnte ich das tatsächlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Drukhari ahnten nicht, dass ein einfacher Sekretär des Adeptus Administratum ihre fremdartige Sprache verstehen könnte. Im Verlauf meiner Folter erfuhr ich, dass die Xenos die ganze Zeit Hilfe von Menschen erhalten hatten. Abtrünnige, Piraten oder dergleichen. Es wird dauern, diese Verräter an der Menschheit ausfindig zu machen, aber ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass sie für die Ereignisse auf Dargonus bezahlen werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Funnily enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. Over the course of my torture, I came to understand that the xenos had been receiving help from humans all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine verbrannten Lippen verziehen sich zu einem verbitterten Lächeln.{/n} "Erstaunlicherweise ... konnte ich das tatsächlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Drukhari ahnten nicht, dass ein einfacher Sekretär des Adeptus Administratum ihre fremdartige Sprache verstehen könnte. Im Verlauf meiner Folter erfuhr ich, dass die Xenos die ganze Zeit Hilfe von Menschen erhalten hatten. Abtrünnige, Piraten oder dergleichen. Es wird dauern, diese Verräter an der Menschheit ausfindig zu machen, aber ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass sie für die Ereignisse auf Dargonus bezahlen werden!"

languages.text: {n}Yanık dudaklarında acı bir tebessüm beliriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Gülünçtür ama edindim. Drukhariler, benim gibi zavallı bir Adeptus Administratum yazmanının yabancı dillerini anlayabileceğini düşünmemiş olsa gerek. Bana işkence ederlerken zenoların uzun süredir insanlardan yardım aldığını öğrendim. İsyancı mı demişlerdi, korsan mı... İnsanlığa ihanet eden bu alçakları bulmak zaman alacaktır fakat yemin olsun, Dargonus'ta olan bitenin bedelini ödeyecekler!"
languages.original_text: {n}His burnt lips twist into a bitter smile.{/n} "Funnily enough... I was, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Drukhari had no idea that a mere Adeptus Administratum secretary could understand their alien speech. Over the course of my torture, I came to understand that the xenos had been receiving help from humans all this time. Renegades, or pirates, or... something of the sort. It will take time to identify these traitors to Humanity, but I give you my word that they will pay for what happened on Dargonus!"
